snippet.title: DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters // Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
We will be alive, even beyond death. 

Embark on a surrealistic afterlife journey to discover the secrets of the broken and mysterious Plane of Memory in this atmospheric, light adventure with a hint of stealth. Explore a wonderful voxel world with an intense cinematic approach. Dive into this profound experience, meet the Plane's inhabitants, and save the day! 

A Cinematic Voxel Experience 

DE-EXIT embraces the clash of minimalistic voxel aesthetic and clean textures on one side and surprises with complex cinematographic features, more realistic VFX, and motion capture animations on the other. 

DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters will release on PC and consoles on April 14th, 2023.

STEAM - https://bit.ly/De-ExitOnSteam
EPIC GAMES STORE - https://bit.ly/DE-EXITonEpic
GOG - https://bit.ly/DE-EXITonGOG

PLAYSTATION 4/5  -  https://bit.ly/DE-EXITonPlayStation
XBOX ONE/X/S - https://bit.ly/DE-EXITonXbox 

#DEEXIT #Voxel #CinematicGame
#HandyGames #SandBloomStudio #IndieDev

by http://www.handy-games.com. ▶
